meanings.definition: Comments or observations made about something.
meanings.sent1: Her remarks about the painting were thoughtful.
meanings.sent2: I appreciated your remarks during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat's remarks on the new dog were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His remarks on the importance of kindness were like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's remarks on the student's progress were encouraging.

meanings.definition: A written or spoken statement expressing an opinion or reaction.
meanings.sent1: His remarks on the movie were interesting.
meanings.sent2: She made some insightful remarks during the debate.
meanings.sent3: The robot's remarks on the weather were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her remarks on the situation were like a splash of cold water.
meanings.sent5: The president's remarks on the economy were concerning.

meanings.definition: To mention or comment on something briefly.
meanings.sent1: He remarks on the weather every morning.
meanings.sent2: She always remarks on how fast time flies.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel remarks on the new bird feeder every day.
meanings.sent4: The old clock remarks on the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The wise owl remarks on the importance of listening.
